details: Blush Colour Infusion from Laura Mercier is a sheer, buildable and silky-smooth cheek colour that blends seamlessly with skin for the most natural, fresh look. Pure colour pigments feel weightless and apply evenly to skin for a healthy-looking flush of colour that lasts 10 hours. Infused with micro-fine powders, this next-generation formula can build from a diffused, sheer hint of color to a bold colour statement. Designed to layer as flawlessly with liquid or powder makeup as it does on bare skin. Shades range from soft neutrals to vivid pops of color, with finishes ranging from matte to a subtle sheen with hidden pearl, to suit a variety of skin tones and skin types.Matte Shades:Ros√© (matte rose pink)Chai (matte dirty rose)Ginger (matte pale nude)Strawberry (matte bright pink)Kir Royale (matte berry wine)Sheen Shades:Sangria (sheen plum berry)Pomegranate (sheen fuschia pink)Fresco (sheen brown nude)Peach (sheen light coral)Grapefruit (sheen red coral)After 4 weeks of independent consumer testing, 31 women agreed that Blush Colour Infusion:Provides natural-looking color (100%)Feels weightless (100%)Applies evenly (100%)Is blendable (100%)Is sheer to buildable, always allowing skin to show through (94%)Skin looks perfect, smooth and fresh (94%)Feels comfortable all day (100%)Does not feel dry on my skin (100%)
ingredients: Talc, Dimethicone, Nylon-12, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Magnesium Myristate, Cetyl Dimethicone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lauroyl Lysine, Hexylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol. May Contain: Mica, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Red 7 (CI 15850).

details: Urban Decay Stay Naked Threesome is a vegan longwear trio of powder bronzer, highlighter, and blush that lasts up to 14 hours with a real-skin matte finish.Stay Naked Threesome's super-smooth powder is incredibly blendable and buildable (it almost feels like a cream), with a natural satin finish that never goes on streaky or cakey. Use the bronzer, highlighter, and blush solo or combined for allover glow and color. Infused with moringa seed oil, Threesome's formula contains antioxidant and anti-pollution properties that help balance and protect skin.
ingredients: Blush: Talc, Silica, Boron Nitride, Zinc Stearate, Nylon-12, Lauroyl Lysine, Dimethicone, Methicone, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil. May contain: CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 73360 / Red 30 Lake, CI 15850 / Red 6.Bronzer, Highlighter: Talc, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Glyceryl Caprylate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Hydrogenated Coco-Glycerides, Nylon-12, Boron Nitride, Lauroyl Lysine, Silica, Magnesium Carbonate, Potassium Sorbate, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Tin Oxide. details: Petite 'n Pretty's 9021-Glow! Eye & Cheek Palette is a pediatrician and dermatologist approved collection of eyeshadows in finishes ranging from amped-up sparkle to dialed-down satins, plus blush and highlighter, to give eyes and cheeks a sheer wash of color. With its custom-size, dual-ended brush, you can create any look you dream up.The sun is always out in Beverly Hills, 9021-Glow! Let your creativity shine with talc-free shades from sandy neutrals to pretty pinks that pop, shimmer or glow. Multidimensional pearls give this pretty palette mega-wow sparkle and light-catching luminosity, while finely milled mica provides smoother, more even and sheer payoff. A custom oil blend ensures every shade feels silky and lets those pearls really shine through. With finishes ranging from amped-up sparkle to dialed-down satin and a custom, dual-ended brush sized to give young creatives more control and precision, you can create any look you dream up.Shades:Flashing Lights (iridescent pink)Poolside Bling (pearly lavender)Pop!-arrazi (pearl-pink bronze)Shimmer Sand (soft, pale pink)Bungalow Bronze (champagne bronze sparkle)Sunset Sparkle (sun-kissed rose)Pink Palms Blush (cool matte pink)Beamer Highlighter (soft pink sparkle)What are the highlights:Includes six age-appropriate eyeshadows, plus blush and highlighterComes with a custom-sized artistry brush with synthetic bristlesEyeshadows are ophthalmologist approvedDermatologist approvedPediatrician approvedWhat else you should know:Cruelty-freeNut-freeGluten-freeTalc-freeParaben-freePhthalate-freePetite 'n Pretty makeup for kids, tweens and teens is inspiring the next generations to express their creativity with high-quality, age-appropriate and pediatrician approved beauty and pro-artistry tools made and sized just for them.

product: Travel Size Amazonian Clay 12 Hour Blush
details: Tarte's Amazonian Clay 12 Hour Blush universally benefits all skin types for a fade-free, flawless finish in shades ranging from soft to vivid and matte to shimmer to suit a wide variety of skin tones.Powered by:Amazonian Clay: Minimizes oil in and around pores to balance skin and keep product in place while also hydrating the skin naturally to restore moisture, reducing the appearance of dry, flaky skin.Final Claims:Dermatologist testedCruelty free

details: Petite 'n Pretty's 9021-Bungalow! Eye & Cheek Palette is a bronzy collection of buildable eyeshadows ranging from understated mattes to saturated shimmers, plus a peachy blush and sparkly highlighter to create the prettiest getaway glow for forever summer looks. This palette is pediatrician and dermatologist approved.Beachside or poolside, catch waves of bliss with the 9021-Bungalow Eye & Cheek Palette from Petite 'n Pretty! With colors ranging from understated sandy mattes to saturated shimmers as pretty as a tropicali sunrise, this teen makeup palette is your go-to for going coastal or lounging in your own private bungalow. Multidimensional pearls give the richly pigmented colors mega-wow sparkle and light-catching luminosity, while finely milled mica provides smoother, more even payoff. A custom oil blend ensures every shade feels silky and lets those pearls really shine through. With this collection of buildable eyeshadows, peachy blush and sparkly highlighter - plus a custom, dual-ended artistry brush - you can create the prettiest getaway glow for forever summer looks. Soak it all up, cabana bae!Shades:Shore Front (light matte nude)Blissed Out Bronze (coppery bronze)Sunkissed Shimmer (light bright gold)Cabana Bae (metallic cranberry)Bahama Nirvana (matte chocolate)Cocoa-Nuts (warm matte brown)TropCali blush (matte peach)Poolside Posh highlighter (sparkling peach)What are the highlights:Includes six age-appropriate eyeshadows, blush and highlighterComes with a custom-sized artistry brush with synthetic bristlesEyeshadows are ophthalmologist approvedDermatologist approvedPediatrician approvedWhat else you should know:Cruelty-freeNut-freeGluten-freeTalc-freeParaben-freePhthalate-freeVeganPetite 'n Pretty makeup for kids, tweens and teens is inspiring the next generations to express their creativity with high-quality, age-appropriate and pediatrician approved beauty and pro-artistry tools made and sized just for them.

details: What it is: A secret weapon to create the appearance of naturally rosy cheeks for a fresh, glowy effect.What Else You Need to Know: Infused with color reviver technology, this innovative blush reacts to the skin's moisture level upon application to deliver a customized rosy effect. The result is a natural, instant healthy glow that lasts all day long.

details: What it is: A high-pigment, petal-soft blush that blends effortlessly into skin for an intense bloom of transfer-resistant color that lasts all day.Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free.What Else You Need to Know: This blush contains silky, micro-milled powder that is highly pigmented yet velvety as a rose petal, allowing it to blend effortlessly into skin. A bouquet of six shades offers a range of depths for every complexion each in a rose compact. Everlasting Blush delivers extreme long wear and a beautiful, soft-matte finish.Clinical Results:In a consumer study on 32 volunteers over 24 hours:- 100% agreed it applied smoothly and seamlessly - 100% agreed it had a soft, velvety texture- 100% felt it was easy to apply.
